name: Street racer (itch) (Fathima Afra)
description:
A street racing game in which you race in  a highway with heavy traffic.

Use arrow keys to steer.

Both first person and third person view available!

the full game is customizable .

The users can change the following on the go!

  • Choose the number of road lines
  •  Change the traffic density
  • Change the Road Width
  • Change the Camera view and height of view
  • Change the Field of View
  • Change the Fog Density
